long_description: Flexible, lightweight and weather-resistant, the Marmot Scree pants in men's long sizes are an essential part of any adventure-ready wardrobe. Soft-shell fabric blends durable nylon with stretchy spandex to offer a high-mobility option that repels moisture and breathes well. Articulated knees allow total flexibility and range of motion without constriction. Zip fly with snap closure; waistband features side elastic and belt loops. Ankle zippers mean easy on/off and cinch down around boots to keep debris out. Features zippered hand pockets, a zip cargo pocket and zip rear pocket. Long-length Marmot Scree pants feature a regular, just-right fit.
